videos.title: A$AP Rocky - A$AP Forever (2018)
videos.description: A$AP Rocky returns as the "fashion killa" in the music video for his latest single, "A$AP Forever," featuring Moby. Directed by Dexter Navy, the video features Rocky and the A$AP Mob in various New York locations, with a cameo by Moby, credited for the heavy sampling of his 1999 hit "Porcelain."
videos.additional_info:
A$AP Rocky - A$AP Forever (2018)

videos.title: The Electric Hotel (1908)
videos.additional_info:
The Electric Hotel (1908)
El hotel eléctrico (The Electric Hotel) is a 1908 silent Spanish comedy-fantasy film directed by Spanish film pioneer Segundo de Chomón. The film displays one of the earliest uses of stop motion animation in history, though it is not de Chomón's first try at this technique. His 1906 film, Le théâtre de Bob, use animated puppets. But El Hotel eléctrico is also an early use of pixilation.
Technique - 1900s , Feedback , Title Card , Vintage , Vintage Graphics , Vintage Titles
Director - Segundo de Chomón
Original Source - Link
BLACK AND WHITE

videos.alt_text: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished
videos.title: adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
videos.description: The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot includes a widely used color bar glitch, more formally known as SMBTE color bars, which date back to 1977. Filmmakers will use this as a transition, and to give their films an analogue aesthetic.
videos.additional_info:
adidas Originals - Original Is Never Finished (2018)
The second installment of the now iconic Original is Never Finished campaign. This shot includes a widely used color bar glitch, more formally known as SMBTE color bars, which date back to 1977. Filmmakers will use this as a transition, and to give their films an analogue aesthetic.
Technique - Feedback
Director - Manu Cossu
DOP - Mattias Rudh
Editor - Christie Brown, Gian Buazulli

videos.alt_text: Joost, Ski Aggu & Otto Waalkes - Friesenjung
videos.title: Joost, Ski Aggu & Otto Waalkes - Friesenjung (2023)
videos.description: The music video for "Friesenjung" by Joost, Ski Aggu, and Otto Waalkes presents a playful and humorous visual narrative that complements the lighthearted and catchy tune of the song. It features a variety of quirky scenes that highlight the cultural and comedic elements typical of Otto Waalkes' performances, blended with the musical styles of Joost and Ski Aggu, creating a unique and entertaining fusion.
videos.additional_info:
Joost, Ski Aggu & Otto Waalkes - Friesenjung (2023)
The music video for "Friesenjung" by Joost, Ski Aggu, and Otto Waalkes presents a playful and humorous visual narrative that complements the lighthearted and catchy tune of the song. It features a variety of quirky scenes that highlight the cultural and comedic elements typical of Otto Waalkes' performances, blended with the musical styles of Joost and Ski Aggu, creating a unique and entertaining fusion.
